post.body: http://tinyurl.com/7mu4xy
Well, either me or Simone. Sorry, woulda said hey.
If you'd like a list of things to do... :)
The gift w/o a tag is ALWAYS from me...
Just don't combine the two!...
And yes, I wore a hat when in public today...
Troy is reminded that he actually likes driving when it's far, far from DC.
Oh, that stay-out-of-the-office plan? Yeah, not so much...
Troy is having a very busy day off.
Playing Mr. Fix-It, and trying to resist the urge to swing by the office today.
Gearing up for Christmas 2008, Pt. 4. Really glad to have an airport-free holiday, but having all the family nearby does have its drawbacks
Troy decided that posting from church would've been bad form - but the acolyte w/purple hair & silver shoes was a nice bonus.
Hmm... accidentally threw away a Christmas present last night. Not good.
Troy wonders if his son is the only kid in America to write a letter to Santa telling him to stay away from our house...
Focusing on small favors: 1. I'm going nowhere near an airport this week. 2. It may be 20 degrees, but nothing is falling from the sky.
Troy is learning more than he'd like to about radiant heating.
Sitting in Columbia Heights. Gratified that the heating repairman is as stumped as I was -- but bracing for the $$$ bill that implies...
IU is losing to Northeastern. (Northwestern would be bad enough.) It's gonna be a long basketball season...
Troy is editing...
Troy is trying to walk on the sunny side of the street today.
